owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

state.description: The state of the milestone. Either `open`, `closed`, or `all`.

sort.description: What to sort results by. Either `due_on` or `completeness`.

direction.description: The direction of the sort. Either `asc` or `desc`.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."
